name: Fools Fight
description:
Fools Fight

Free downloadable party game for Windows.

When a mad king became dissatisfied with the state of his realm, he put the blame on his loyal subjects. He decided to punish them by making them fight for survival in his arena. There is one weapon, and only the last person standing may live.

Description
Defeat your opponents in an arena by beating them on the head with a hammer until you are the last one still standing. The hammer 1-shots your opponents when you hit them. The last player standing in a round gets a point. The player with the most points after the last round wins the game. 

Features
2-to-20-person fast pace multiplayer fights
Use weapons like the hammer to defeat other opponents
Choose from a cast of 4 unique characters (WIP)
Awesome party gameplay
